actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to amend section 507(a)(3) of title 11, United States Code, to give priority to certain claims of persons that are independent sales representatives.
short_title: Independent Sales Representatives Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1993

summary.text: Independent Sales Representatives Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1993 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to include the claims and expenses of an independent sales representative among those entitled to statutory priority status.

titles.title: Independent Sales Representatives Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1993
A bill to amend section 507(a)(3) of title 11, United States Code, to give priority to certain claims of persons that are independent sales representatives.
